title: Minor Rejection
description:
Mina Kimes and Frank Isola discuss everything coming out of MLB ALL-Star week including Manfred’s rejection of the idea that Minor Leaguers don’t make a living wage. Also, what does the Lakers’ big three talking on the phone mean?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Tony Kornheiser, Michael Wilbon
itunes:subtitle: PTI: MLB All-Star Week comes to a close and Manfred's comments on Minor Leaguers.
